name: immich-kiosk
description: Immich Kiosk is a simplified read only front end for Immich designed for kiosks and shared displays. It focuses on browsing and viewing photos with minimal controls, using Immich as the backend media source.
features: Kiosk Mode: Simplified, read-only interface designed for public or shared displays.
Minimal Controls: Streamlined UI with only essential navigation for easy viewing.
Immich Backend: Uses your existing Immich server as the photo source.
Shared Display: Perfect for waiting rooms, offices, or family common areas.
Touch-Friendly: Optimized for touchscreen interaction on tablets and kiosks.
Auto-Refresh: Automatically updates to show new photos from Immich.
No Editing: Read-only access prevents accidental modifications to your library.
Customizable Views: Configure which albums or photos to display in kiosk mode.
